title: Vitamin D injection into the dorsal-CA1 hippocampus improves short-term sleep deprivation induced cognitive impairment in male rats
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Amir Rezagholizadeh, Amin Firoozi, Zohreh Tavassoli, Amir Shojaei, Narges Hosseinmardi, Javad Mirnajafi-Zadeh, Kristi Anne Kohlmeier, Yaghoub Fathollahi
